languages.text: {n}Эльдар неодобрительно косится на Маражая, и тонкие губы кривятся в легкой ухмылке.{/n} "Ты боишься меня, дитя теней? Правильно. После всего, что твой кабал сделал с моими братьями, тебе стоит трепетать от ужаса и молить о прощении".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдар неодобрительно косится на Маражая, и тонкие губы кривятся в легкой ухмылке.{/n} "Ты боишься меня, дитя теней? Правильно. После всего, что твой кабал сделал с моими братьями, тебе стоит трепещать от ужаса и молить о прощении".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдар неодобрительно косится на Маражая, и тонкие губы кривятся в легкой ухмылке.{/n} "Ты боишься меня, дитя теней? Правильно. После всего, что твой кабал сделал с моими братьями, тебе стоит трепетать от ужаса и молить о прощении".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sideways glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble with fear and beg for forgiveness."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}El Aeldari mira de soslayo a Marazhai con gesto de desaprobación, y una leve sonrisa de burla asoma a sus delgados labios.{/n} «¿Me tienes miedo, hijo de las sombras? Eso es bueno. Después de todo lo que tu kábala le ha hecho a mi gente, deberías estar temblando de miedo y suplicando mi perdón».
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Aeldari mira de soslayo a Marazhai con gesto de desaprobación, y una leve sonrisa de burla asoma a sus delgados labios.{/n} «¿Me tienes miedo, hijo de las sombras? Eso es bueno. Después de todo lo que tu kábala le ha hecho a mi gente, deberías estar temblando de miedo y suplicando mi perdón».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}アエルダリはマラズハイを不満そうに横目で見ると、かすかな苦笑いを浮かべ、その薄い唇に不敵な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「私を恐れているのか、影の子よ。いいことだ。お前の陰謀団が我が血族にしたことを考えれば、お前は恐怖に震えて許しを請うべきだからな」
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}アエルダリはマラズハイを不満そうに横目で見ると、かすかな苦笑いを浮かべ、その薄い唇に不敵な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「私を恐れているのか、影の子よ。いいことだ。お前の陰謀団が我が血族にしたことを考えれば、お前は恐怖に震えて許しを請うべきだからな」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}艾达灵族不以为然地斜睨着玛拉斋，薄薄的嘴唇咧出挖苦的微笑。{/n}“你是在害怕我吗，暗影之子？这很好。你的阴谋团对我的族人做了那么多坏事，你确实该在恐惧中颤抖，乞求原谅。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾达灵族不以为然地斜睨着玛拉斋，薄薄的嘴唇咧出挖苦的微笑。{/n}“你是在害怕我吗，暗影之子？这很好。你的阴谋团对我的族人做了那么多坏事，你确实该在恐惧中颤抖，乞求原谅。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}L'Aeldari lance un regard oblique réprobateur à Marazhai et ses lèvres fines esquissent un sourire narquois.{/n} « Auriez-vous peur de moi, enfant de l'ombre ? C'est une bonne chose. Après tout ce que votre kabale a fait à mon peuple, vous devriez trembler de terreur et implorer mon pardon. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Aeldari lance un regard oblique réprobateur à Marazhai et ses lèvres fines esquissent un sourire narquois.{/n} « Auriez-vous peur de moi, enfant de l'ombre ? C'est une bonne chose. Après tout ce que votre kabale a fait à mon peuple, vous devriez trembler de terreur et implorer mon pardon. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Der Aeldari wirft Marazhai einen missbilligenden Blick von der Seite zu, dabei verformen sich seine schmalen Lippen zu einem leicht schiefen Lächeln.{/n} "Ihr fürchtet Euch vor mir, Kind der Schatten? Das ist gut. Nach allem, was Eure Kabale meiner Art angetan hat, solltet Ihr vor Furcht erzittern und um Vergebung betteln."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aeldari wirft Marazhai einen missbilligenden Blick von der Seite zu, dabei verformen sich seine schmalen Lippen zu einem leicht schiefen Lächeln.{/n} "Ihr fürchtet Euch vor mir, Kind der Schatten? Das ist gut. Nach allem, was Eure Kabale meiner Art angetan hat, solltet Ihr vor Furcht erzittern und um Vergebung betteln."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Aeldari, Marazhai'a göz ucuyla onaylamaz bir bakış atıyor. Bükülen ince dudakları, belli belirsiz bir gülümseme lütfediyor.{/n} "Benden korkuyor musun gölgelerin çocuğu? Güzel. Kabalının soydaşlarıma yaptığı onca şeyden sonra korkudan titreyip af dilemelisin."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari, Marazhai'a göz ucuyla onaylamayan bir bakış atıyor. Bükülen ince dudakları, belli belirsiz bir gülümseme lütfediyor.{/n} "Benden korkuyor musun gölgelerin çocuğu? Güzel. Kabalının soydaşlarıma yaptığı onca şeyden sonra korku içinde titreyip af dilenmen gerek."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
